flavorText: Those who dare stand in its path are either brave or mindless. Or in the case of goblins, both.

foreignData.flavorText: Wer sich ihm in den Weg stellt, ist entweder dumm oder tapfer. Bei Goblins gilt beides.
foreignData.name: Klingenzahn-Keiler
foreignData.text: Einschüchtern (Diese Kreatur kann außer von Artefaktkreaturen und/oder Kreaturen, mit denen sie eine Farbe gemeinsam hat, nicht geblockt werden.)

foreignData.flavorText: Aquellos que osan interponerse en su camino son valientes o insensatos. O en el caso de los trasgos, ambas cosas.
foreignData.name: Jabalí colmillo afilado
foreignData.text: Intimidar. (Esta criatura no puede ser bloqueada excepto por criaturas artefacto y/o criaturas que compartan un color con ella.)

foreignData.flavorText: Ceux qui osent lui bloquer le passage sont courageux ou stupides. Ou dans le cas des gobelins, les deux.
foreignData.name: Sanglier lamecroc
foreignData.text: Intimidation (Cette créature ne peut pas être bloquée excepté par des créatures-artefacts et/ou des créatures qui partagent une couleur avec elle.)

foreignData.flavorText: Quanti osano incrociare il suo cammino sono coraggiosi o molto stupidi. O nel caso dei goblin, entrambe le cose.
foreignData.name: Cinghiale Zannaffilata
foreignData.text: Intimidire (Questa creatura non può essere bloccata tranne che da creature artefatto e/o creature che condividono con essa un colore.)

foreignData.flavorText: そいつの前に立ちはだかる奴は、勇敢か馬鹿かのどちらかだ。 ゴブリンの場合は、その両方だ。
foreignData.name: 刃牙の猪
foreignData.text: 威嚇 （このクリーチャーはアーティファクト・クリーチャーかそれと共通の色を持つクリーチャー以外にはブロックされない。）

foreignData.flavorText: Aqueles que ousam cruzar seu caminho ou são corajosos ou estúpidos. Ou, no caso dos goblins, ambos.
foreignData.name: Javali Canino-de-Navalha
foreignData.text: Intimidar (Esta criatura só pode ser bloqueada por criaturas artefato e/ou criaturas que compartilhem uma cor com ela.)

foreignData.flavorText: Те, кто осмеливаются встать у него на пути, либо храбрые, либо безмозглые. Либо, как гоблины, и то и другое.
foreignData.name: Саблезубый Вепрь
foreignData.text: Устрашение (Это существо может быть заблокировано только артефактными существами и (или) существами, у которых есть такой же цвет, как у него.)

foreignData.flavorText: 胆敢挡其路者，不是勇士便是愚人。 如果是鬼怪的话，那么两者皆是。
foreignData.name: 刃牙野猪
foreignData.text: 威吓 （此生物只能被神器和／或与它有共通颜色的生物阻挡。）

name: Bladetusk Boar
originalText: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

rulings.text: Intimidate looks at the current colors of a creature that has it. Normally, Bladetusk Boar can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or red creatures. If it's turned blue, then it can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or blue creatures.
If an attacking creature has intimidate, what colors it is matters only as the defending player declares blockers. Once it's blocked, changing its colors won't change that.

text: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
